item.title: Backwalking and Crouching Uppercuts
item.description: I think of these as two different drills, but they’ve been grouped here because the settings are exactly the same.

item.title: Charge Character Throw Loops + Anti-Air
item.description: With charge characters, throwing after a whiffed throw is very awkward. This drill is good for making charge reversals doable when a throw whiffs.

item.title: Crosscut Uppercuts
item.description: This uppercut training is good for keeping people in the corner, stopping people from crossing you up, and rewiring your brain to prioritize follow-up actions when throws get jumped.

item.title: Delayed Drive Rush Offense
item.description: This drill is good for breaking your opponent’s guard in the following situations: You read that they’re using throw-tech or jabs after blocking during a Drive Rush and want to pull them out.

item.title: Drive Impact Defense
item.description: This training is good for encoding your system to react to Drive Impact by training your visual and audio cues as well as your reaction after getting the Drive Impact.

item.title: OD Reversal Punish
item.description: This training is good for encoding your system to react to OD Reversals that are blocked or whiffed with the proper punish.
